name: tm58
effect: Teaches Endure to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Sky Drop to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Endure)

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user takes the target into the sky, then drops it during the next turn. The target cannot attack while in the sky.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user takes the target into the sky, then drops it during the next turn. The target cannot attack while in the sky.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user crashes into its target while rotating its body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.
